title: Confession of Praise
verses: Psalm 34:1 (WEB) — “I will bless Yahweh at all times. His praise will always be in my mouth.”
Hebrews 13:15 (WEB) — “Let’s offer up a sacrifice of praise to God continually.”
Psalm 103:1–2 (WEB) — “Bless Yahweh, my soul… don’t forget all his benefits.”
Psalm 150:6 (WEB) — “Let everything that has breath praise Yahweh! Praise Yahweh!”
body: To praise is to re-tell who God is and what He has done. In all seasons, choose gratitude and adoration—the posture that lifts the soul.
prayer: Great and gracious God, I praise You for Your holiness, mercy, and faithfulness. Fill my mouth with thanksgiving today. Amen.
